content: use color changing yarn to do all the colorwork for you with this easy self-striping crochet beanie pattern to work this beanie you need to know how to double_crochet front post double_crochet and back post double_crochet that s it the combination of post stitches and regular double_crochet sts give this beanie it s texture and pattern and is very easy to work up there is a full video tutorial on the post too
